name: Hongwei SHI
memberOrga: self-employed consultant and inspector, no web.
goal: Mr. Hongwei SHI (English name: Steven) has engaged in quality and product safety field more than 20 years. In recent 10 years, his main research direction is "batch production compliance control" which will play an important and fundamental part in future product compliance mechanism. His dream is to establish a global product safety compliance scheme which can be sensible and traceable by any stakeholder via mobile internet and link to big data base.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: CE-marking; New Approach; consumer product safety; consumer product compliance traceability;conformity module;
